XRViewerPose.summary: The WebXR Device API interface XRViewerPose represents the pose (the position and orientation) of a viewer's point of view on the scene. Each XRViewerPose can have multiple views to represent, for example, the slight separation between the left and right eye.

remarks.para: This view can represent anything from the point-of-view of a user's XR headset to the viewpoint represented by a player's movement of an avatar using mouse and keyboard, presented on the screen, to a virtual camera capturing the scene for a spectator.
